languages.text: "Смертн{mf|ый|ая}. Кто ты так{mf|ой|ая}, чтобы перечить самим токам рока?" {n}Видение опускает голову, не отрывая уничтожающего взгляда от вас. На мгновение в лице Теодоры что-то меняется — словно на него набегает... {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}тень страха{/d}?{/n} "Неважно. Твои шаги — эхо песка, что пересыпается из одной чаши весов в другую. Твои чаяния и вера — моя насмешка".

"Mortal. Who are you to oppose the very flows of fate?" {n}The vision lowers its head, its harrowing gaze boring into you. For but a moment, something changes in Theodora's expression. It almost looks like a shadow of... {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}fear{/d}?{/n} "It matters not. Your footfalls are an echo of the sand pouring between the scales. Your hopes and faith are my mockery."
languages.original_text: "Смертн{mf|ый|ая}. Кто ты так{mf|ой|ая}, чтобы перечить самим токам рока?" {n}Видение опускает голову, не отрывая уничтожающего взгляда от вас. На мгновение в лице Теодоры что-то меняется — словно на него набегает... {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}тень страха{/d}?{/n} "Неважно. Твои шаги — эхо песка, что пересыпается из одной чаши весов в другую. Твои чаяния и вера — моя насмешка".

traits.locale_text: {n}The creature bends its neck, studying you. For but a moment you feel as if it is... wary of you?{/n} "It matters not. Your footfalls are an echo of the sand pouring between the scales. Your hopes and faith are my mockery."

{n}The creature bends its neck, studying you. For but a moment you feel as if it is... wary of you?{/n} "It matters not. Your footfalls are an echo of the sand pouring between the scales. Your hopes and faith are my mockery."

"Mortal. Who are you to oppose the very flows of fate?" {n}The vision lowers its head, its harrowing gaze boring into you. For but a moment, something changes in Theodora's expression. It almost looks like a shadow of... fear?{/n} "It matters not. Your footfalls are an echo of the sand pouring between the scales. Your hopes and faith are my mockery."

{n}The creature bends its neck, studying you. For but a moment you feel as if it is... wary of you?{/n} "It matters not. Your footfalls are an echo of the sand pouring between the scales. Your hopes and faith are my mockery."

"Mortal. Who are you to oppose the very flows of fate?" {n}The vision lowers its head, its harrowing gaze boring into you. For but a moment, something changes in Theodora's expression. It almost looks like a shadow of... fear?{/n} "It matters not. Your footfalls are an echo of the sand pouring between the scales. Your hopes and faith are my mockery."

languages.text: “区区一介凡人，竟敢违逆命运的安排？”{n}这只生物低下了头，空洞的目光仿佛要将你刺穿。有那么一瞬间，你感觉到西奥多拉的表情发生了变化，它看起来似乎对你怀着淡淡的……{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}恐惧{/d}？{/n}“这并不重要，你的脚步不过是黄沙洒在鳞片上的回声，你的希望与信仰是我嘲弄的对象。”
languages.original_text: "Mortal. Who are you to oppose the very flows of fate?" {n}The vision lowers its head, its harrowing gaze boring into you. For but a moment, something changes in Theodora's expression. It almost looks like a shadow of... {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}fear{/d}?{/n} "It matters not. Your footfalls are an echo of the sand pouring between the scales. Your hopes and faith are my mockery."

traits.locale_text: {n}这只生物将脖子折向你，研究着你。有那么一瞬间，你感觉到它似乎……对你心怀戒备？{/n}“这并不重要，你的脚步不过是黄沙洒在鳞片上的回声，你的希望与信仰是我嘲弄的对象。”

languages.text: «Mortal. ¿Quién eres para interponerte en el camino del destino?». {n}La visión agacha la cabeza para examinarte. Por un momento, algo cambia en la expresión de Theodora. Casi parece que siente... ¿{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}miedo{/d}?{/n} «No importa. Tus pasos son el eco de la arena que cae entre los platos de la balanza. Tus esperanzas y tu fe son motivo de burla».
languages.original_text: "Mortal. Who are you to oppose the very flows of fate?" {n}The vision lowers its head, its harrowing gaze boring into you. For but a moment, something changes in Theodora's expression. It almost looks like a shadow of... {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}fear{/d}?{/n} "It matters not. Your footfalls are an echo of the sand pouring between the scales. Your hopes and faith are my mockery."

traits.locale_text: {n}La criatura dobla el cuello para examinarte. Durante un breve instante sientes como si estuviera... ¿recelosa de ti?{/n} «No importa. Tus pasos son el eco de la arena que cae entre los platos de la balanza. Tus esperanzas y tu fe son motivo de burla».

languages.text: 「人間よ。運命の流れそのものに逆らえるとでも？」{n}幻影は頭を下げ、その恐ろしい視線があなたを貫く。ほんの一瞬だけ、シオドーラの表情に変化が現れたように見えた。それはまるで…{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}恐怖{/d}の影のようにも見えた。{/n}「そんなことはどうでもいい。お前の足音は、天秤に流れ込む砂の響きに過ぎない。お前の希望と信仰を私は嘲笑うだけだ」
languages.original_text: "Mortal. Who are you to oppose the very flows of fate?" {n}The vision lowers its head, its harrowing gaze boring into you. For but a moment, something changes in Theodora's expression. It almost looks like a shadow of... {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}fear{/d}?{/n} "It matters not. Your footfalls are an echo of the sand pouring between the scales. Your hopes and faith are my mockery."

traits.locale_text: {n}生き物は首を曲げてあなたを詳しく観察している。ほんの一瞬、あなたはそれが警戒…しているように感じる？{/n}「そんなことは関係ない。お前のフットフォールは鱗の間に砂が降り注ぐ音だ。お前の希望と信仰は私の嘲笑だ」

「人間よ。運命の流れそのものに逆らえるとでも？」{n}幻影は頭を下げ、その恐ろしい視線があなたを貫く。ほんの一瞬だけ、シオドーラの表情に変化が現れたように見えた。それはまるで…{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}恐怖{/d}の影のようにも見えた。{/n}「そんなことはどうでもいい。お前の足音は、天秤に流れ込む砂の響きに過ぎない。お前の希望と信仰を私は嘲笑うだけだ」

languages.text: « {mf|Mortel|Mortelle}. Qui vous autorise à vous opposer aux flux du destin ? » {n}La vision baisse la tête et vous transperce de son regard assassin. L'espace d'une fraction de seconde, quelque chose change dans l'expression de Théodora. Quelque chose qui vous évoque l'ombre de... {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}la peur{/d} ?{/n} « C'est sans importance. Le bruit de vos pas n'est qu'un écho du sable qui s'égraine entre les plateaux de la balance. Vos espoirs et votre foi sont pour moi source de moquerie. »
languages.original_text: "Mortal. Who are you to oppose the very flows of fate?" {n}The vision lowers its head, its harrowing gaze boring into you. For but a moment, something changes in Theodora's expression. It almost looks like a shadow of... {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}fear{/d}?{/n} "It matters not. Your footfalls are an echo of the sand pouring between the scales. Your hopes and faith are my mockery."

traits.locale_text: {n}La créature tord son cou pour mieux vous observer. Pendant un bref instant, vous avez l'impression... qu'elle se méfie de vous ?{/n} « C'est sans importance. Le bruit de vos pas n'est qu'un écho du sable qui s'égraine entre les plateaux de la balance. Vos espoirs et votre foi sont pour moi source de moquerie. »

languages.text: "{mf|Sterblicher|Sterbliche}! Wer seid Ihr, dass Ihr es wagt, Euch dem Fluss des Schicksals zu widersetzen?" {n}Die Vision senkt ihren Kopf und scheint dich mit ihrem grauenvollen Blick zu durchbohren. Für einen Moment ändert sich etwas in Theodoras Gesichtsausdruck. Es sieht beinahe aus wie ein Hauch von ... {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}Furcht{/d}?{/n} "Es spielt keine Rolle. Eure Schritte sind ein Echo des Sandes zwischen den Waagschalen. Eure Hoffnungen und Euer Glaube sind mein Spott."
languages.original_text: "Mortal. Who are you to oppose the very flows of fate?" {n}The vision lowers its head, its harrowing gaze boring into you. For but a moment, something changes in Theodora's expression. It almost looks like a shadow of... {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}fear{/d}?{/n} "It matters not. Your footfalls are an echo of the sand pouring between the scales. Your hopes and faith are my mockery."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Kreatur beugt den Hals und mustert dich. Für einen Augenblick fühlt es sich an, als wäre sie dir gegenüber ... misstrauisch?{/n} "Es spielt keine Rolle. Eure Schritte sind ein Echo des Sandes zwischen den Waagschalen. Eure Hoffnungen und Euer Glaube sind mein Spott."

languages.text: "Ey fâni. Kaderin akışına karşı çıkmak senin ne haddine?" {n}Silüet, başını eğiyor ve ızdırap veren bakışları âdeta ruhunu deliyor. Derken bir anlığına Theodora'nın yüz ifadesinde bir şey değişiyor. {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}Korkunun{/d} belli belirsiz bir gölgesi mi yoksa gördüğün?{/n} "Önemi yok. Attığın adımlar, teraziye dökülen kumun yankısından ibaret. Tüm umutların ve inancın benim için beyhude."
languages.original_text: "Mortal. Who are you to oppose the very flows of fate?" {n}The vision lowers its head, its harrowing gaze boring into you. For but a moment, something changes in Theodora's expression. It almost looks like a shadow of... {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}fear{/d}?{/n} "It matters not. Your footfalls are an echo of the sand pouring between the scales. Your hopes and faith are my mockery."

traits.locale_text: "Ey fâni. Kaderin akışına karşı çıkmak senin ne haddine?" {n}Silüet, başını eğiyor ve ızdırap veren bakışları âdeta ruhunu deliyor. Derken bir anlığına Theodora'nın yüz ifadesinde bir şey değişiyor. Korkunun belli belirsiz bir gölgesi mi yoksa gördüğün?{/n} "Önemi yok. Attığın adımlar, teraziye dökülen kumun yankısından ibaret. Tüm umutların ve inancın benim için beyhude."

"Ey fâni. Kaderin akışına karşı çıkmak senin ne haddine?" {n}Silüet, başını eğiyor ve ızdırap veren bakışları âdeta ruhunu deliyor. Derken bir anlığına Theodora'nın yüz ifadesinde bir şey değişiyor.
